thread.title: Man Utd defender Jones withdraws from England squad
thread.title_full: Man Utd defender Jones withdraws from England squad

title: Man Utd defender Jones withdraws from England squad
text:
Man Utd defender Jones withdraws from England squad Getty Images 0 21 Mar 2017 14:58:00 
Phil Jones has withdrawn from the England squad for the forthcoming fixtures against Germany and Lithuania. 
Details of the injury sustained by the Manchester United defender are unknown although the Three Lions, and United, have confirmed the player has returned to the club for further treatment. Phil Jones will return to #MUFC after being released from the England squad due to an injury sustained in training. pic.twitter.com/TUaonuzQFq â€” Manchester United (@ManUtd) March 21, 2017 
More to follow...
